list.name: Changes
list.comment: ConsoleClient refactoring 9:20 pm start - 10 pm; 10:25 am - 11:26 am. All recepie creation methods had been moved into the separate class RecepieConstructor. creatRecepieSteps method had been replaced with addRecepieStep method as soon as list of steps are already part of the Recepie class. All input methods were extracted from recepie creation methods and left in ConsoleClient class. Main static method had been moved into the separate Runner class.

task.summary: Initial classes structure (Tool, Recepie, Action, Recepie, RecepieStep, Controller) had been created.
Input interface and ConsoleInput class had been added. Strategy pattern is going to be used for different input methods.
Second class with Ivan. Main method refactory- createRecepie, createRecepieSteps and CreateRecepieStep methods were extracted from the main method.

ConsoleClient refactoring 9:20 pm start - 10 pm; 10:25 am - 11:26 am. All recepie creation methods had been moved into the separate class RecepieConstructor. creatRecepieSteps method had been replaced with addRecepieStep method as soon as list of steps are already part of the Recepie class. All input methods were extracted from recepie creation methods and left in ConsoleClient class. Main static method had been moved into the separate Runner class.
